attributes.action: Raise income tax by 1% to fund a 5% average  pay rise for NHS healthcare staff
attributes.additional_details: Properly recognise the value of NHS staff who have been at the forefront of the response to the coronavirus pandemic and identify clearly and openly the way this will be funded. Accept that this is a policy decision and not an economically constrained decision.
attributes.background: Debate this proposal and offer a free vote on the income tax increase and pay award. Abide by and enact the majority decision reached by MPs.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Increase income tax/NI to give NHS staff a larger pay increase
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578466

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970
